tool_description: Allow users to search for Tags used on the Japanese Rakuten Marketplace (Ichiba).
name: Rakuten Marketplace Tag Search
title: Rakuten Marketplace Tag Search

api_list.name: /services/api/IchibaTag/Search/20140222
api_list.description: Search for Tags used on the Japanese Rakuten Marketplace (Ichiba).

required_parameters.name: tagId
required_parameters.description: Tag ID can be grabbed by Rakuten Marketplace Genre Search API.  Must be 7 digits long number greater than 0.
